name: Crossy Road
description: A retro-style terminal game developed in Java using MVC architecture and Design Patterns, featuring a robust test suite built with JUnit, Mockito, and Pitest.

name: Prog-project
description: A C++ project developed to practice Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts. It includes multiple image transformations such as rotation (e.g. 90Â°), filters, and desaturation (grayscale conversion). The main focus was on building well-structured, reusable classes and working directly with pixel-level image data.
